underlying_goal: Migrate DBFS root checkpoint paths to Unity Catalog Volumes in a Databricks project, create coding standards to prohibit DBFS root usage, and set up the necessary infrastructure (GCS bucket, Storage Credential, External Location) via Terraform
friction_detail: Claude initially created the skill as a 'migration guide' rather than a 'coding standard/prohibition', and tried to ask the user for a GCS bucket path instead of creating one via Terraform as the user expected.
brief_summary: User wanted to migrate DBFS root paths to Unity Catalog Volumes, create a coding prohibition skill, and set up Terraform infrastructure for External Locations; Claude completed most tasks iteratively with minor course corrections from the user.
